title: 749. Week 13 Big Games, 8 Teams Outside Looking In, Rookie QB Report & Reaction to Joe Brady Firing
itunes:title: 749. Week 13 Big Games, 8 Teams Outside Looking In, Rookie QB Report & Reaction to Joe Brady Firing
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 13 of the NFL season. The guys start by breaking down the big 3 games from Sunday. Next, the trio discuss the 8 teams that are outside looking in, while focusing on the AFC and NFC playoff picture. Following that, the guys preview the Monday Night Football matchup between the New England Patriots and Buffalo Bills. Then, the trio give a grade to the rookie quarterbacks based off their Week 13 performances. After, the guys give their reaction to the Carolina Panthers firing offensive coordinator Joe Brady and discuss what went wrong. To wrap up the show, the trio look at how impressive this rookie class has been.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
